m_szDocTitle: Kbb.com Editors Name 10 Best Used Cars Under $8,000 - InsuranceNewsNet
m_szDocSumamry: Kbb.com Editors Name 10 Best Used Cars Under $8,000 PR Newswire Association LLC /PRNewswire/ -- Kelley Blue Book (Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20111102/AQ99077LOGO ) As economic conditions in the U.S. continue in a state of flux, many find themselves unable to afford a new car and unwilling to place themselves under a large car loan to get one. As more consumers shift their gaze from new cars to used, it's becoming harder every day to find quality used cars, let alone at a great price. However, there are still ways to get into a good (and modern) vehicle without spending too much mo
